embeds.title: :globe_with_meridians: Country drop-down list empty during checkout :globe_with_meridians:
embeds.description: The Country list is empty by default, you must start typing your country name to see the list.

embeds.title: :credit_card: Payment/Transaction issues :credit_card:
embeds.description:
When using certain third party payment types **(Paypal, Stripe, etc)** the transaction on the RSI website isn't approved instantly and may be waiting for approval from the bank. You must __wait until it is approved before you can access the game__.

**The following are the different status' for RSI store transactions:**

Closed & Paid - The transaction is complete

Voided - It was manually cancelled

Pending - Awaiting approval from the bank

Abandoned - The payment did not go through

__Only RSI Support agents can help with any payment issues__, [contact them here](https://support.robertsspaceindustries.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

embeds.title: :money_with_wings: Can't add store credit :money_with_wings:
embeds.description:
When trying to use Store Credit, you must add it from the [RSI Store Cart](here) instead of during checkout.

Also note, __store credit cannot be used for any Warbond pledge or any physical merch item__.

embeds.title: :interrobang: Missing game package or ships :interrobang:
embeds.description:
If you had a Game Package and it is now missing, it is likely one of the following:

1. You had a **Promotional Package** during a previous free fly event. This was not a Pledge that you paid for, but was a __temporary game pack to access the event__ while it ran.

2. You melted (exchanged for store credits) your Game Pack and bought a **Standalone Ship** instead. Go back and buy a game pack, it is __required to access the game__.

3. You paid for a ship through the **'grey market'**. If you did this and no longer have it, __check your emails from RSI Support__, as the ship was likely stolen and then returned to its proper owner. Don't risk it, buy direct from the [RSI Store](https://robertsspaceindustries.com/pledge).

embeds.title: :hourglass: What happens when you do a Character Reset :hourglass:
embeds.description:
A [Character Reset](https://support.robertsspaceindustries.com/hc/en-us/articles/360041509433-Account-Reset) is a tool used when your in-game account or character is bugged and cannot be fixed using other workarounds.

```What to use it for:```
Errors and bugs such as:
 - Encountering an infinite loading screen.
 - Your character cannot interact with anything (doors, terminals, and ships).
 - All of your ships have become unflyable
  - You are unable to complete the character creation process for some reason. 

```What NOT to use it for:```
 - Resetting your crime rating or reputations. 
 - Recovering aUEC invested into lost armor, gear, or cargo

```For best results:```
Exit the game and launcher completely, wait 5 minutes, Reset, wait 1 hour, and then log back into the launcher/game. **Waiting like this helps to avoid further corruption and loss of gear.**

__The reset is not a wipe__, you will not lose everything, however certain things are removed to fix bugs:
 - Your ammo and medpens are removed to fix an inventory bug.
 - Your mission progress is reset
 - Your ship components will be reset to default (equipped custom components should be returned to storage)

**You will not lose**: Money, Ships, Armor, Weapons, Attachments and Reputation.

```"It says my aUEC will be reset!"```
Yes, reset to match the **Long Term Persistence Ledger**, __not wiped__. The LTP Ledger is __saved each time you play__ the game without issue, so you'll get back all your money from the last save.

```"But the page says to only wait 15 minutes?"```
It actually says that you're **locked out of your account** for 15 minutes, not that the reset process __only takes 15 minutes__.

__1 hour is the sweet spot__ that we've found ([and CIG agrees](https://i.imgur.com/8OPt9yu.gif)) over years of troubleshooting, **waiting less significantly increases** your chances of the reset process being interrupted and either __not fixing the issue or making it worse__.

Perform a [character reset here](https://robertsspaceindustries.com/account/reset).

embeds.title: :octagonal_sign: Issue Council login error :octagonal_sign:
embeds.description: This error appears when you click on a link to the issue council without being logged in first. Log in to view the page.

embeds.title: :no_entry: Issue Council Access Denied :no_entry:
embeds.description: This error appears when you are trying to access a report concerning the PTU, when you don't have access to the PTU yet. See: [PTU access waves](here).
